libraries.title: Baroque Masterpieces
libraries.description: Discover the grandeur of Baroque music with detailed compositions and lessons.
libraries.composer: Johann Sebastian Bach, George Frideric Handel, Antonio Vivaldi, Henry Purcell

libraries.title: Romantic Era Symphonies
libraries.description: Immerse yourself in the emotional depth of Romantic era symphonies.
libraries.composer: Ludwig van Beethoven, Johannes Brahms, Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky, Franz Schubert

libraries.title: Contemporary Pop Hits
libraries.description: Learn to play the latest hits from today's top pop artists.
libraries.composer: Taylor Swift, Ed Sheeran, Ariana Grande, Billie Eilish

libraries.title: Hip Hop Essentials
libraries.description: Master the beats and rhythms of hip hop music with our expert tutorials.
libraries.composer: Dr. Dre, Kendrick Lamar, Kanye West, Jay-Z

libraries.title: R&B Classics
libraries.description: Explore the soulful sounds of R&B with classic tracks and lessons.
libraries.composer: Aretha Franklin, Stevie Wonder, Marvin Gaye, Whitney Houston

libraries.title: Country Ballads
libraries.description: Get into the heart of country music with timeless ballads and instructional guides.
libraries.composer: Johnny Cash, Dolly Parton, Willie Nelson, Hank Williams

libraries.title: Reggae Rhythms
libraries.description: Feel the groove of reggae with essential tracks and detailed lessons.
libraries.composer: Bob Marley, Peter Tosh, Burning Spear, Jimmy Cliff

libraries.title: Folk Traditions
libraries.description: Explore traditional folk music from various cultures around the world.
libraries.composer: Joan Baez, Bob Dylan, Woody Guthrie, Pete Seeger

libraries.title: World Music Fusion
libraries.description: Experience the fusion of different world music genres with this eclectic collection.
libraries.composer: Yo-Yo Ma, Ravi Shankar, Youssou N'Dour, Anoushka Shankar

libraries.title: Ambient Soundscapes
libraries.description: Relax and unwind with ambient soundscapes designed to calm and soothe.
libraries.composer: Brian Eno, Moby, Tycho, Aphex Twin

libraries.title: Latin Beats
libraries.description: Feel the vibrant energy of Latin music with our comprehensive course.
libraries.composer: Carlos Santana, Shakira, Ricky Martin, Gloria Estefan

libraries.title: K-Pop Sensations
libraries.description: Learn to play the hottest K-Pop tracks with detailed tutorials.

libraries.title: Metal Mayhem
libraries.description: Master the intensity of metal music with our in-depth lessons.
libraries.composer: Metallica, Iron Maiden, Black Sabbath, Slayer

libraries.title: Punk Rock Anthems
libraries.description: Learn the raw energy of punk rock with classic tracks and instructional guides.
libraries.composer: The Ramones, Sex Pistols, The Clash, Green Day

libraries.title: Indie Rock Gems
libraries.description: Discover the best of indie rock with our curated collection of songs and lessons.

libraries.title: Alternative Rock Classics
libraries.description: Explore the defining tracks of alternative rock with our detailed tutorials.

libraries.title: Soundtrack Scores
libraries.description: Experience the magic of film music with our collection of iconic soundtrack scores.

libraries.title: Holiday Favorites
libraries.description: Celebrate the festive season with our collection of holiday music.

libraries.title: Dance Floor Hits
libraries.description: Get the party started with our collection of dance floor anthems.
